withdrawal.identity.help_text: Deine ID-Karte wird benötigt, um sicherzustellen, dass dein Konto nicht gehackt wurde. nicecactus nimmt die Sicherheit deiner Daten sehr ernst.
withdrawal.identity.solo_form_title: Du musst den Scan deines Personalausweises mit der Notiz schicken:
withdrawal.identity.solo_form_text:
"Ich, der/die Unterzeichnende {FirstNameLastName}, bestätige hiermit, dass ich der Eigentümer dieser beigefügten ID-Karte bin.
Geschehen in {City}, am {Date}" 

gefolgt von deiner handschriftlichen Unterschrift.
withdrawal.identity.parental_consent.hel: Als minderjährige Person musst du eine schriftliche Einverständniserklärung deiner Eltern hochladen, die dich zur Teilnahme an den Turnieren berechtigt.
withdrawal.identity.parental_identificat: Der Personalausweis des Elternteils wird benötigt, um deine Identität zu überprüfen und sicherzustellen, dass du der Elternteil bist.
Du musst den Scan deines Personalausweises mit der Notiz schicken:

"Ich, der/die Unterzeichnende {FirstNameLastName}, bestätige hiermit, dass ich der Eigentümer dieser beigefügten ID-Karte bin.
Geschehen in {City}, am {Date}" 

gefolgt von deiner handschriftlichen Unterschrift.

team.list.noteamtext: Um eine optimale Leistung zu erreichen, ist es nicht die beste Option, andere Spieler online in den Spielen zufällig zu treffen! Hauptbarrieren für viele Spieler sind Teamdynamik und Kommunikation. Erstelle noch heute dein Team, um andere Spieler zu treffen, in unseren Turnieren anzutreten, die kollektive Intelligenz zu stimulieren und deine Motivation durch die Teilnahme an einer Online-Community zu steigern. Du kannst ein Team erstellen oder, wenn du ein bestehendes Team suchst, in unserem Discord nachsehen.

Once the titular players have been chosen, you have 3 extra slots for substitute players ({selectedSubstitutes}/{maxSubstitutes})
tournament.registration.team.select_capt: The capitain is the team’s spokeperson. They will be in charge of communicating with the opponent, creating or inviting teammates to lobby
tournament.registration.team.select_the_: In this tournament, substitutes are allowed, so you can select 0 to {maxSubstitutes} substitute players.
tournament.registration.team.can_not_fin: I cannot find a player: find out why the player is not eligible

tournament.overview.line-up.welcome-mess: Thank you for signing up, we remind you the following steps for the big date:
tournament.overview.line-up.1st-step: Confirm attendance in the match tab
tournament.overview.line-up.2nd-step: Create or wait for the creation of the lobby
tournament.overview.line-up.3rd-step: Play and claim your victory or defeat
tournament.overview.line-up.4th-step: Wait for your next opponent or your final result
tournament.overview.line-up.reminding-te: Let us help you reminding when the tournament takes place! We can offer you several tools:

only.captain.can.talk: Only the captain can talk with the other team
tournament.cancel.reason.external_issue: Due to an incident beyond our control the tournament is cancelled, thank you for your understanding.

tournament.cancel.reason.low_checkin: The tournament is cancelled by the staff because the eligibility requirements have not been met.
tournament.howto.select.your.favorite.ga: From the Tournament homepage, accessible from the main menu, select your favorite game in the left menu to get the full list of upcoming tournaments.
tournament.howto.this.will.lead.you: Click on the tournament you want to join, this will lead you to the tournament page.
tournament.howto.we.need.your.account.to: we need your user account for the game you are playing to verify your score
tournament.howto.click.on.free.sign.up: Click on SIGN UP to register to the tournament
tournament.howto.and.join.the.tournament: Don't forget to come to the tournament the D day ! You can add a Google Agenda event reminder for that.
tournament.howto.this.button.will.appear:
This button will appear when every match begins. Checking in means you are ready to compete!
                        Keep in mind that you have 10 minutes before the tournament to check in.
tournament.check.in.for.each.match: You have to CHECK IN for each match you will play.
tournament.howto.when.the.tournament.tak: When your match starts, go to the MATCHES tab and check the following widget. If you are the lobby creator, you have to invite your opponent directly in the game. Once the match is over, Click on "VICTORY" or "DEFEAT" (or DRAW).
tournament.howto.we.prevent.cheating.tha: We prevent cheating thanks to our locked score system for some games. After that time, feel free to provide your correct score
tournament.howto.our.moderated.proof.sys: At any time, you to add a proof of match from this widget. Also, a referee may ask you to add a proof. Our moderated proof system prevents cheating and assures fairplay.
tournament.howto.keep.in.touch: Keep in touch with your opponent and the tournament staff through the chat
tournament.howto.follow.the.bracket: Follow the bracket path and compete for the first place
tournament.howto.limitless.wallet.with.s: Limitless wallet with several currencies ready to be withdrawn
tournament.howto.and.level.up.your.profi: And level up your profile above and beyond

tournament.checkin.full: It seems that there is no place for you in his tournament... Why don’t you check for similar ones?
tournament.waitinglist.remember.registra: Remember that the check in phase will last now 15 minutes and you will only do it once for the tournament. Registration is open during this time and you will be automatically checked in.
tournament.checkin.thanks: Thanks for checking in, please wait for the tournament to start
tournament.waitinglist.title: Waiting list
tournament.waitinglist.joined: You joined a waiting list tournament!
tournament.waitinglist.example.one: In this case, if 32 people or more won’t check in from the prioritary list, checked-in waiting list participants will have a slot in this tournament.
tournament.waitinglist.example.two: If there is less than 32, only the ones from the waiting list who checked in first will fill up the remaining slots.
tournament.waitinglist.notguaranteed: You are not guaranteed to play unless you have a free slot on the piority list after the check in phase. This means that the first ones in the waiting list to check in will be able to take the unused seats from the prioritary slots.
tournament.status.scheduled.message.regi: Click on the “check in” button to participate to the tournament
